mapper.insert: INSERT INTO employees (fName, lName, salary, positions_id, passport_id, employeesInfo_id) VALUES (#{fName}, #{lName}, #{salary}, #{positions_id}, #{passport_id}, #{employeesInfo_id})
mapper.update: UPDATE employees SET fName=#{fName}, lName =#{lName}, salary =#{salary}, positions_id =#{positions_id}, passport_id =#{passport_id}, employeesInfo_id =#{employeesInfo_id} WHERE id =#{id};
